meanings.sent1: The preworked project was finished early.

meanings.definition: Already completed or prepared before a certain time or event
meanings.sent1: The preworked meal was waiting in the fridge.
meanings.sent2: They had preworked arrangements for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The preworked surprise party was a hit.
meanings.sent4: Her preworked speech was a shining example.
meanings.sent5: The preworked gift brought smiles all around.
